description: This file defines Flask API routes for managing products, including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and calculating total inventory balance. It uses Flask-Smorest, SQL queries, and Marshmallow schemas.

classes.name: ProductsList
classes.description: API endpoint for listing all products and creating new products.

classes.name: ProductsBalance
classes.description: API endpoint for calculating total inventory value.

classes.name: ProductDetail
classes.description: API endpoint for retrieving, updating, and deleting a specific product by ID.

methods.name: _row_to_product
methods.description: Converts a database row to a product dictionary.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests for listing products, total balance, or retrieving a product by ID.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new product.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET request for total inventory balance.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET request for a product by ID.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a product by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a product by ID.
